menu.title: Explore The Menu
menu.description: Explore our diverse menu offerings, from appetizers to desserts, with tantalizing descriptions and mouthwatering photos.

menu_1.title: Gourmet Pizza
menu_1.description: A crispy thin crust topped with fresh mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, basil leaves, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze. A perfect harmony of flavors.

menu_2.title: Sushi Platter
menu_2.description: Vibrant and colorful sushi rolls with fresh fish, avocado, cucumber, and tobiko. A delightful experience for sushi lovers.

menu_3.title: Braised Short Ribs
menu_3.description: Tender short ribs braised in rich red wine sauce, served with creamy mashed potatoes and roasted carrots. Comfort food at its best.

menu_4.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu_4.description: A decadent chocolate cake with warm molten chocolate, served with vanilla ice cream and fresh berries. Pure indulgence.

menu_5.title: Mango Tango Salad
menu_5.description: A refreshing salad with ripe mango, mixed greens, grilled chicken, and tangy mango vinaigrette. A burst of flavors.

menu_6.title: Crispy Calamari
menu_6.description: Lightly breaded and fried calamari rings served with zesty marinara sauce and lemon wedges. Perfectly crispy and delicious.

menu_7.title: Grilled Salmon Steak
menu_7.description: Perfectly grilled salmon steak, seasoned and served with garlic mashed potatoes and saut√©ed vegetables. A savory delight.

menu_8.title: Truffle Risotto
menu_8.description: Creamy risotto infused with truffle, topped with parmesan cheese and fresh herbs. A luxurious dining experience.

menu_9.title: Prime Ribeye Steak
menu_9.description: Juicy prime ribeye steak, grilled to preference, with roasted potatoes, grilled asparagus, and red wine reduction sauce. Steak perfection.
